DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand effectiveness ten-week internet-based cognitive behavioral therapy ( iCBT ) treatment improve depressive symptom , cop resilience skill , cognitive processing .
DOC.brief_title: Internet Based Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Effects Depressive Cognitions Brain Function
DOC.detailed_description: The need mental health service high among military personnel perceive stigma barrier prevent many Soldiers obtain help need . Alternative mental health treatment approach mitigate stigma increase access compliance greatly need . One promising treatment approach show efficacy preliminary research may address issue relate stigma barrier care , internet-based cognitive behavioral therapy ( iCBT ) . Internet-based treatment offer brief , interactive , structured treatment approach complete individual relatively anonymously , convenience privacy home , accord schedule . Such intervention could offer Soldiers alternative treatment method minimize stigma allow private quasi-anonymous access treatment minimize barrier care enhance access maximize schedule flexibility . Emerging evidence suggest iCBT particularly promising well-accepted approach treat large number individual minimize cost clinician ' time demand . The study internet-based computer-assisted therapy currently infancy study still lack sufficient methodological rigor firmly establish efficacy applicability approach . The propose project provide comprehensive evaluation iCBT date employ functional neuroimaging technique , neurocognitive test implicit negative bias response negative feedback , assessment resilience cop capacity addition standard symptom-based outcome measure .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age range 18 45 . Subjects must right hand ( measure Edinburgh Handedness Inventory ) . The primary language subject must English Must regular access computer internet connection printer ( potential MDD MAC participant ) DSMIV criterion current Major Depressive Episode accord SCID ( enrollment MDD MAC group ) Absence psychotropic medication least 2 week ( 6 week fluoxetine ; 6 month neuroleptic ; 2 week benzodiazepine ; 2 week antidepressant ) PHQ9 score 5 ( enrollment HC group ) Exclusion criterion : Any history neurological illness brain injury Current past DSMIV Axis I disorder ( enrollment HC group ) Complicating medical condition may influence outcome neuropsychological assessment functional imaging ( e.g. , HIV ) Mixed lefthandedness Abnormal visual acuity correct contact lenses Metal within body , claustrophobia , contraindication MRI Less 9th grade education Past current alcohol/substance dependence , current alcohol abuse , current past substance abuse ( i.e . past alcohol abuse exclusionary ) Use illicit drug within past year Use marijuana within past month Current use opioid prescribe stimulant medication History psychotic mental illness ( schizophrenia bipolar disorder ) Current severe symptom depression ( total score > 23 respond > 1 Question 9 suicidal ideation Patient Health Questionnaire9 Item [ PHQ9 ] ( Kroenke et al. , 2001 ) ) A PHQ9 score 10 ( potential MDD MAC participant ) Currently participate Cognitive Behavior Therapy History ECT treatment
